! parse
err 'cannot reference resource svca.Moo outside the service'

-- svca/svca.go --
package svca

import (
    "context"

    "encore.dev/storage/sqldb"
)

var Moo = sqldb.Named("moo")

//encore:api public
func Foo(ctx context.Context) error {
    return nil
}
-- svcb/svcb.go --
package svcb

import (
    "context"

    "test/svca"
)

//encore:api public
func Bar(ctx context.Context) error {
    _ = svca.Moo.Query()
    return nil
}
